definition: to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Delicate and finally put MeiFeng aunt to give away.
sentences.chinese: 楚楚終於把美鳳阿姨給送走了。

sentences.english: Sent a bumper grain harvest in the autumn, dancing snowflakes in winter has finally arrived.
sentences.chinese: 送走了五穀豐登的秋天，雪花飛舞的冬天終於來臨了。

sentences.english: Peter had not really believed his dad would send Granddad away.
sentences.chinese: 彼得本來並不相信相信爸爸真的會把爺爺送走。

sentences.english: Karp and his friends soon dropped off some 400 fragments.
sentences.chinese: 卡普和他的朋友們很快送走了大約400件殘塊。

sentences.english: Why else would she send me away?
sentences.chinese: 還有其他理由讓她將我送走嗎？

sentences.english: She had asked Ser Barristan that question the afternoon the hostages went forth.
sentences.chinese: 送走人質當天下午她曾問過巴利斯坦爵士。

sentences.english: The footman bowed the guests out.
sentences.chinese: 男僕恭恭敬敬地送走了客人。

sentences.english: Bid farewell to the countless more days, leaving behind the bitter suffering.
sentences.chinese: 送走的是悠悠歲月，留下的是苦難辛酸。

sentences.english: They played the Old Year out.

sentences.chinese: 我們的行李已早於我們送走了。

sentences.english: They sang the old year out and the new year in.
sentences.chinese: 他們唱歌送走舊年，迎接新年。

sentences.english: No, we should complete the job and then say goodbye to our friends.
sentences.chinese: 我們要完成自己的任務，然後再送走朋友。

sentences.english: Just off the beautiful Dhang E, ushered in the birthday of the motherland.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛送走了美麗的嫦娥，又迎來了故國的華誕。

sentences.english: The host serves visitors the best food and always sees them off at the end of their stays.
sentences.chinese: 主人爲客人提供最好的食物並且總是在最後送走他們。

sentences.english: At least take one last look before you send her away.
sentences.chinese: 你至少再看她最後一眼，然後再把她送走。

definition: to release/to set free/to allow (a person or an animal) to go/to liberate
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/undisturbed/peaceful
to return to one's unit/to go back to one's station in life
to stay behind to take care of things
to put in order/to tidy up/to pack/to repair/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
to send to/to deliver to/to give sb a lift (e.g. in a car)
to leave home/to go off/to run away
